author: passthenachos
title: Content Wallet for Experiences
description: 消費者はクリエーターから切り離される。クリエイターは下流のインプレッションや収益から切り離される。ウォレットはDAppエコシステムから切り離されている。

f6_assessments.q0:
It is difficult for an outsider to understand what are the problem and the solution to solve the problem. The proposal looks more like a concept than as a working product.

Based on the info provided the proposal doesn't fit in the challenge objectives.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposal lacks in providing relevant information about resources to be used, what is to be done and how. The budget is not outlined and broken down into identifiable items and the amount requested ($100k) is way too much for what the proposer offers.

The proposal does not offer a realistic timetable to complete the work.

The proposal does not provide a sensible and conductible plan for implementation that shows what is being done and how.

The proposer has not considered challenges and risks relevant to a successful implementation.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal itself reads very poorly. It reads like a concept more than an executable proposal. It needs more editing so that it can be assessed properly given its direction. Perhaps reworking it and submitting it at the later stages will work. 

Unfortunately there is nothing to assess at this proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: Unwithdrawn 65 words draft proposal requesting $100k to do something which is not clear at all (the monetization of moments...).
f6_assessments.q1:
Impressive experience is given in a few words but without any links to back it up.
A detailed plan was "coming soon" but never came unfortunately. The team should have withdrawn this proposal.
f6_assessments.q2: 65 words draft proposal without any detail.

f6_assessments.q0:
"Creating an interactive wallet to connect consumers and content creators is a great way for blockchain applications to help connect people with each other in a decentralized way and without intermediaries. This is a pretty cool idea
But in this proposal, all of them are just ideas, but there is no specific product or implementation plan, so it is difficult to assess the impact of the proposal."
f6_assessments.q1:
"The founding team holds over 20 US patents, 2 Technical Emmys, 1 Oscar, Multiple exits, existing web 2.0 Series B funds with A list clients.
This is an admirable amount of experience. But there is no evidence for these claims to cast doubt on the veracity of the information proposed by the proposer.
Besides, the product is not yet available, the plan is still lacking information, which makes this proposal unfeasible."
f6_assessments.q2:
"No information about any relevant aspects are given, making the proposal not auditable. The proposer would have to add the following parts to his proposal to make the idea assessible:
Roadmap and milestones
Definition of success  (e.g. metrics or KPIs appropriate to this challenge)

At the moment it does not seem reasonable to ask for 100.000 Dollars without providing relevant information on auditability. Documentation would have to be included as well.
"

f6_assessments.q0: The solution for the given problem does not have an elaborated information. Explanation on how the interactive wallet for the monetization of moments in content with a decentralized design platform is not given.
f6_assessments.q1: There are no roadmaps/key metrics/challenges and risks management on the proposal, or even the summary of the outplan for the proposal. Based only from the experience, the voters nor CA(s) could not understand or comprehend what the proposer is trying to achieve within the ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q2: There is no updated details on the proposal and funding required have no budget allocation or so forth. Thus there isn't any to be audited or can be.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal focuses on the content wallets for creators, brands, and NFT owners. The problem statement [Consumers disconnected from Creator. Creators removed from downstream impressions and revenue. Wallets are disconnected from the DApp ecosystem] is not explained in detail. Although this proposal is incomplete and the solution direction is very abstract, it is worth trying for completing in the following fund. Based on the given information, I disagree with this proposal's impact, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q1: This team's profile is not provided, and, there is no proof/link for verification. As a result, I can not agree with this proposal's feasibility, and would give it a score of 2.
f6_assessments.q2: Since this is an incomplete proposal, I strongly disagree with this proposal's auditability, and would give it a score of 1.

solution: クリエイター、ブランド、NFTオーナーは、分散型のデザインプラットフォームを用いて、コンテンツの瞬間をマネタイズするためのインタラクティブなウォレットを使用します。
experience: 創業者チームは、20件以上の米国特許、2つのテクニカルエミー賞、1つのオスカー賞を受賞しており、複数の出口を持ち、既存のWeb 2.0シリーズB資金を獲得して、Aリストの顧客を抱えています。
